modernwarpmenu.config.categories.general: Settings that customize the functionality of the modern warp menu
modernwarpmenu.config.categories.develop: Settings for features used by pack developers to create custom textures and layouts for the modern warp menu
modernwarpmenu.config.categories.support: Click to join the Modern Warp Menu Discord server
modernwarpmenu.config.categories.updateA: There is a new version of Modern Warp Menu available. Click for more details.
modernwarpmenu.config.title: Modern Warp Menu Settings
modernwarpmenu.config.subtitle: Categories
modernwarpmenu.config.warpMenuEnabled.to: Replace the default warp menu with the modern warp menu
modernwarpmenu.config.showIslandLabels.t: Show each island's name below its picture
modernwarpmenu.config.hideWarpLabelsUnti: Hide Warp Labels Until Island Hovered
Hide the island's warp button labels until the mouse is hovering over the island
modernwarpmenu.config.hideWarpLabelForIs: Hide Warp Label for One Warp Islands
Hide warp label for islands with only one warp
modernwarpmenu.config.suggestWarpMenuOnW: Reminders to Use Modern Warp Menu
Show reminders to use the modern warp menu when the player uses a warp command
modernwarpmenu.config.addWarpCommandToCh: Add Warp Command to Chat History
Add warp commands sent by the modern warp menu to your chat history
modernwarpmenu.config.showJerryIsland.to: Show the Jerry's Workshop island on the modern warp menu
modernwarpmenu.config.hideUnobtainableWa: Hide warps only obtainable during special game modes such as Bingo
modernwarpmenu.config.enableUpdateNotifi: Show a notification on the settings button and in the settings menu when a new version of Fancy Warp Menu is available
modernwarpmenu.config.showRegularWarpMen: Show the button to access the regular warp menu
modernwarpmenu.config.showDebugOverlay.t: Show an overlay with coordinate values and button borders over the modern warp menu. Press TAB while the warp menu is open to toggle.
modernwarpmenu.config.drawBorders.toolti: Show borders around island and warp buttons. Press B while the modern warp menu is open to toggle.
Skip checking for whether the player is on SkyBlock
modernwarpmenu.config.alwaysShowJerryIsl: Always show Jerry's Workshop on the warp menu regardless of the value of the general > showJerryIsland setting and the in-game season
modernwarpmenu.messages.useWarpMenuInste: Reminder to use the Modern Warp Menu instead!
modernwarpmenu.errors.slotHasNoItem: Slot %d Has No Item to Click On
modernwarpmenu.errors.mouseIsHoldingItem: Mouse is Already Holding an Item
modernwarpmenu.errors.modernWarpGui.ches: Chest inventory size (%d) is smaller than expected (%d), falling back to vanilla chest UI
modernwarpmenu.errors.modernWarpGui.item: Chest item match check failed, falling back to vanilla chest UI
